title: Performance Optimization Techniques for React Apps
description: Optimize your React applications for better performance. Learn about code splitting, memoization, lazy loading, and profiling techniques.

sections.title: React Performance Fundamentals
sections.content:
React performance optimization focuses on **minimizing unnecessary re-renders** and **reducing bundle size**. Key concepts include:

• Understanding the React rendering cycle
• Identifying performance bottlenecks
• Measuring performance improvements
• Balancing optimization with code readability

sections.title: Memoization with React.memo and useMemo
sections.content:
Memoization prevents unnecessary recalculations and re-renders:

**React.memo**: Prevents component re-renders when props haven't changed
**useMemo**: Memoizes expensive calculations
**useCallback**: Memoizes function references

Use these tools judiciously—premature optimization can hurt performance!
